opera australia

16 page publication - Opera Australia

pronto

Pronto a a delivery company to rival FedEx. Creation of sub brands, advertising and collateral.

claritea

This brief was to work from branding name/concept to package development. Claritea is for the senses and inspired by the Chakras but refined to simplicity and elegance.

portrait | Kobi

These photos are a collection of images taken for the Melbourne Fashionista and successful blogger, Kobi Jae.

See more of my shots at Horror Kitsch Bitch

food expose

Given only the name "Food Expose" the brief was to design a unique packaging boxset and three accompanying DVD cases/disk.

This brief focused on the fine dining movement throughout Europe.

doncaster dealerships

Work completed for Bossman.

Rebrand the three dealerships Doncaster Jaguar, Land Rover and Alfa Romeo. Simple word marks to compliment exisiting materials for each brand.

Letterhead, Business cards, media wall, invitations and eDMs created.

milk bar

This brief was to design a brand for a new Flinders Lane bar "Milk Bar". The purpose of this design was to create a bright, modern brand that goes against the aesthetic of inner Melbourne bars.

fashion spread

La Parisienne- Sunday Style Magazine This redesign of an exisiting magazine spread was to create a cutting edge design and improve on the work from the Sunday Style Magazine.

portrait | Tegan

This collection was to demonstrate the human condition. Focus was on the eyes and the gaze of a 'princess' in this twisted modern fairytale.

kales kupcakery

Kales Kupcakery is a start up cupcake business.

The client wanted a "classy" and "elegant" brand and identity.

Artwork created by hand to demonstrate the handmade cupcakes.

jack's

Jacks is a lifestyle brand which is to exude a classy ruggedness. Starting with a range of meat smoking kits, Jacks is looking to move into other products for the modern man.
